content:
Congratulations on signing up for Walgreens Balance Rewards! Linking your loyalty card to the Walgreens app is a great way to earn points and track your rewards. Here's a step-by-step guide to help you link your loyalty card to the app:

**Method 1: Linking through the Walgreens App**

1. Download and install the Walgreens app from the App Store (for iOS devices) or Google Play Store (for Android devices).
2. Open the app and tap on "Sign In" at the top right corner.
3. Enter your Walgreens.com username and password to log in. If you don't have a Walgreens.com account, create one by tapping on "Create an Account."
4. Once logged in, tap on the "Balance Rewards" icon at the bottom of the screen.
5. Tap on "Link Card" and enter your Balance Rewards card number (found on the back of your physical card).
6. Enter your last name and ZIP code to verify your account.
7. Tap "Link Card" to complete the process.

**Method 2: Linking through the Walgreens Website**

1. Go to Walgreens.com and sign in to your account.
2. Click on "Balance Rewards" at the top of the page.
3. Click on "Link Card" and enter your Balance Rewards card number (found on the back of your physical card).
4. Enter your last name and ZIP code to verify your account.
5. Click "Link Card" to complete the process.
6. Once linked, you can access your Balance Rewards account through the Walgreens app by signing in with your Walgreens.com credentials.

**Tips:**

* Make sure you have the latest version of the Walgreens app.
* If you have multiple Balance Rewards cards, you can link them all to your Walgreens account.
* You can also earn points by scanning your physical Balance Rewards card at checkout or by entering your phone number associated with your Balance Rewards account at checkout.

Now that you've linked your loyalty card to the app, you can start earning points on your purchases and tracking your rewards!
